Box 10925, Eugene, OR 97440 (telephone: 503-485-6599) Date: 1984 Materials: Program disk, backup, data disk, and manual Price: $695; $49.95 manual only; $17.95 demo disk; educational price for a single copy license, $420; unlimited license, $1000 Machine Specificity: IBM PC, xT, and AT System Requirements: 256k RAM; Dos 2.0; graphics board; two double-sided drives or fixed disk Effectiveness: Good User-Friendliness: Excellent Documentation: Good

Price: The Americas, $59.95; Europe, $59.95 Machine Specificity: Apple II series; Macintosh; IBM PC; TRS-80. System Requirements: 48k memory, one disk drive.Effectiveness: Poor User-Friendliness: Good Documentation: Adequate to better-than-adequate

Software Reviews : How a Bill Becomes a Law Reviewed by: James B. Software Reviews : 1-2-3 Forecast! Staff review Publisher: Bruce L. Gates, PO Box 12582, Salem, OR 97309 (telephone : 503-585-8314) Year of Publication: 1985 (Version 2) Materials: Template diskette; 52-page spiral-bound manual. Price: $75; educational discount rate for 1-9 copies ($56.25), 10-99 copies ($37.50), over 100 copies ($30.00); lab package of one disk and five manuals for educational institutions only, $85.00. Machine Specificity: IBM Pc and MS-DOS machines. System Requirements: Requires Lotus 1-2-3; 192k memory, two double-sided 320/360k disk drives, color adapter for graphs. Software Reviews : Decision Analyst 1.4 Staff review Publisher: Executive Software Inc., Two North State Street, Dover, Delaware 19901 (705-722-3373) Materials: One diskette with 8½” by 11” looseleaf binder, 200 pages. Price: $139 Availability: IBM PC, Wang PC, Zenith Z 100, TI Pro, DEC Rainbow, and other MS-DOS systems. System Requirements: 96K RAM, DOS 2.0, 80-column display, two disk drives of 140k each; preferred: Two drives of at least 240k each, printer. Effectiveness: Fair User-Friendliness: Good Documentation: Good

Software Reviews : ThinkTank 2.0 (An Outline Processor) Reviewed by Werner F. Grunbaum, University of Missouri—St. Louis Publisher : Living Videotext, 2432 Charleston Road, Mountain View, CA 94043 (telephone: 415-964-6300) Materials: One copy-protected diskette, 64-page bound manual with index, three months diskette warranty, $30 to replace diskette during the following twelve months. Price: $195 Machine Specificity: IBM PC and 100% compatibles. Other versions for ri Professional, Ti Pro-Lite, Macintosh and Apple n. System Requirements: Pc-DOS 2.0 or higher; 256K internal memory (uses up to 640K); single double-sided drive; color or monochrome monitor. Effectiveness: Excellent (File transfer and printing features: Fair) User-Friendliness: Excellent Documentation: Good

Software Reviews : The Campaigner Reviewed by Patrick W. Hamlett, University of Missouri—Rolla Publisher: Rainbow Management Systems, Inc., 1301 Banks, Houston, Texas 77006 (telephone: 203-847-6750) Year of Publication: 1985 Materials: Four disks: Master File/Finance, Targeting, Polling, Scheduling/Canvassing, user's manual Price: $495 Machine Specificity: ISM and compatibles System requirements: 128K memory, dual drive or HD, DOS 1.1 1 Effectiveness: Good User-Friendliness: Excellent Documentation: Good

Software Reviews : Executive Writer and Executive Filer (formerly “The Idea Processor”) Staff review Publisher: Paperback Software International, 2612 Eighth St., Berkeley, CA 94710 (telephone: 415-644-2116) Year of Publication: 1984 Materials: Writer, 146-page manual and disk; Filer, 198-page manual and disk. System Requirements: 256k memory on Pcjr, 192k memory otherwise for Filer, 128k for Writer; two double-sided drives for Filer, one for Writer; graphics card for Draw-It module. entry.dc:title: Software Reviews : History of the U.S.: Democomp Series Reviewed by Martin C. Campion, Pittsburg State University Publisher: Focus Media, Inc., 839 Stewart Avenue, Garden City, NY 11530 (telephone: 516-794-8900; 800-645-8989) Year of Publication: 1984 Materials: Six program disks, six backup disks, six pamphlets with instructions, content guides, applications, assignments Price: $249.00 for whole package, or $49.00 for each of six parts ($294.00 total)Machine Specificity: Apple IT, Commodore 64 System Requirements: Standard computer with one disk drive; a color TV or monitor is necessary to get full value from the displays Effectiveness: Fair User-Friendliness: Fair Documentation: Good

Software Reviews : Graphplan Reviewed by Mark D.
